description: This table stores the filing order changes for a member.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Filing Order History record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: FO_EFF_DT
columns.description: The effective date of the filing order for a coverage

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the coverage ID.

columns.name: MANUAL_FILING_ORDER
columns.description: The manual filing order of the coverage.

columns.name: AUTO_FILING_ORDER
columns.description: The automatic filing order of the coverage.

columns.name: CVG_EFF_YN
columns.description:
Flag indicating if the coverage is effective


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MANUAL_FO_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the category of the manual filing order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Special


N/A


N/A and Special

columns.name: AFO_ASSIGNED_TIER
columns.description: This item stores the tier assigned to a coverage by based on the logic on the configuration table.

columns.name: COVERED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the covered status of the coverage. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Covered


Not Covered


Pending


In Question


Invalid

columns.name: AFO_TIEBREAKER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The tier of the Automatic Filing Order (AFO) tiebreaker that a coverage matched on."-" (category value 30) indicates that the tiebreaker was calculated, but not present. An empty value means that the filing order history contact was saved before the system started saving the tiebreaker.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Special coverage


Payor or Plan set to always first


Non-dependent, through current employment


Non-dependent, through retirement


Non-dependent, through continuation of benefits


Non-dependent, unknown if it is through employment


Non-dependent, not through employment


Adult dependent, through current employment


Adult dependent, through retirement


Adult dependent, through continuation of benefits


Adult dependent, unknown if it is through employment


Adult dependent, not through employment


Child dependent, court decree makes subscriber responsible for cost


Child dependent, court decree makes subscriber's spouse responsible


Child dependent, court decree makes subscriber jointly responsible 


Child dependent, court decree makes subscriber's spouse jointly responsible


Child dependent, no court decree, custody N/A


Child dependent, no court decree, subscriber has more than 50% custody


Child dependent, no court decree, subscriber has equal custody


Child dependent, no court decree, subscriber's spouse has more than 50% custody


Child dependent, no court decree, subscriber's spouse has equal custody


Child dependent, no court decree, subscriber has less than 50% custody


Child dependent, no court decree, subscriber's spouse has less than 50% custody


Child dependent, court decree makes subscriber not responsible


Child dependent, court decree makes subscriber's spouse not responsible


Spouse or child relationship to subscriber, if coverages with both of these relationships to subscriber are present


Not listed as a member yet


Payor or Plan set to always last


Medicaid


N/A


-

columns.name: AFO_TIEBREAKER_SORT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sort order for coverages that match on the same tiebreaker line (AFO_TIEBREAKER_C). "-" (category value 30) represents that the tiebreaker sort order was calculated, but not present. An empty value means that the filing order history contact was saved before the system started saving the tiebreaker sort order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Covered through status, effective date, then creation instant


Birthday rule


Effective date, then birthday rule


Birthday rule, covered through status, then effective date


Birthday rule, then effective date


Effective date, then creation instant


-


Creation instant


Covered through status, then creation instant


Birthday rule, then covered through status

columns.name: GROUP_NUMBER
columns.description: This column stores what the group number was for this coverage during the filing order effective range. Group number is an identification number assigned to the employer or plan group.
